page.title: 17Housing In Hoo.
page.content: The old village of Hoo has been greatly enlarged to a population of over 8000 with the contruction of new {housing}estates since the 1950's. Growth results from proximity and good access to London and the Medway Towns as well as the develpoment of major industrial concerns nearby.Houses of all types can be found in the village terraced, semi_detached and detached as well as prefabricated homes around Hoo Marina. Housing styles have changed greatly over time and recently favour the mock_Georgian. There is a growing trend towards private ownership rather than rented accommodation, as well as improving provision for the car and a growing interest in DIY or{home maintenance.
